source: TEXT_HEAVNZ516_01851_SEQ_00<tab>Mogzun is staring down his surroundings with all of his might.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ516_01851_SEQ_00<tab>グロン・レイのモグズンは、辺りの様子を伺っているようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ516_01851_SEQ_01<tab>Mogzun's assignment is to slay the meliae infesting the area─but first he needs someone to show him how to do it. Slay three meliae and bring Mogzun branches pulled from their corpses as proof.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ516_01851_SEQ_01<tab>モグズンは<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20E5401 /var>の討伐を目標としているようだ。グロン・レイの「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20E5401 /var>」から「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AEF01 /var>」を3個入手しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ516_01851_SEQ_02<tab>The meliae have been slain and their branches are in your possession. Deliver them to Mogzun.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ516_01851_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AEF01 /var>を入手した。グロン・レイの「モグズン」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ516_01851_SEQ_03<tab>You have delivered the branches to Mogzun, and he claims to have learned much from watching you fight. However, apparently watching is just as hard as doing, and he has decided to end his training for the day.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ516_01851_SEQ_03<tab>モグズンに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AEF01 /var>を渡した。冒険者の戦いは参考になったようだが、見学に集中して疲れたと言って帰ってしまった。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ516_01851_TODO_00<tab>Slay gnarled meliae for their branches.
TEXT_HEAVNZ516_01851_MOGZUN_000_000<tab>Ah, I spy a melia right over there! As that's my assigned beast, I'd best slay it before it scurries away in fright, kupo.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ516_01851_MOGZUN_000_000あそこにがいるくぽ？
モグの目標は、あいつを倒すことくぽ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ516_01851_MOGZUN_000_001<tab>Of course, I can't do battle without instruction. If you cut down three meliae and bring me a branch from each, that should be enough to inspire me!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ516_01851_MOGZUN_000_001参考にしたいから、教官から戦ってほしいくぽ。
から「」を3個、
持ってくるところが見たいくぽ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ516_01851_MOGZUN_000_010<tab>I'll follow your lead, Commander! Get to chopping that wood, kupo!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ516_01851_MOGZUN_000_010参考にしたいから、教官から戦ってほしいくぽ。
から「」を3個、
持ってくるところが見たいくぽ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ516_01851_MOGZUN_000_020<tab>There's no better way than to learn by seeing. Did you bring the melia branches, kupo?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ516_01851_MOGZUN_000_020参考にしたいから、教官から戦ってほしいくぽ。
から「」を3個、
持ってくるところが見たいくぽ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ516_01851_MOGZUN_000_021<tab>Ah, yes...these are indeed melia branches─I trust you gave them a sound thrashing. Your fighting inspires me to new heights, Commander!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ516_01851_MOGZUN_000_021おお、間違いなくくぽ！
教官の戦い、とっても参考になったくぽ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ516_01851_MOGZUN_000_022<tab>I am so inspired, in fact, that I'm already quite tuckered out! A trainee must not overexert himself too early. Rest is when we can reflect upon lessons learned. Drill over, kupo!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ516_01851_MOGZUN_000_022でも、今日は見学に集中しすぎて疲れたくぽ。
無理するのは良くないくぽ！
適度に休むのも仕事くぽ、訓練終了くぽ！
